directions: Place 3 tortillas on a large greased baking sheet. Sprinkle each with sausage, red pepper, green onion and cheese. Top each with a tortilla.
Place baking sheet on the center oven rack; preheat the oven's broiler.
Broil for 2 minutes on each side or until golden brown.
ingredients: 12 (8-inch) Mission Super Soft Fajita Grande Tortillas
1 (12 ounce) package Johnsonville® Chipotle Monterey Jack Cheese Chicken Sausage, chopped
title: Johnsonville Chipotle Monterey Jack Cheese Sausage Quesadillas
